author: The Hindu Net Desk
title: Actor Purab Kohli says that he and his family are diagnosed with coronavirus
description: The ‘Rock On!!’ star, his wife Lucy, and children Inaya and Osian are all recovering from COVID-19 symptoms in London
content:
Rock On!! actor Purab Kohli, who is in London, took to Instagram to reveal today that he and his family have been diagnosed with the novel coronavirus, and are taking all the measures to stay safe.
The Bollywood star and former VJ wrote a lengthy post in whi… [+2259 chars]
